headline: The London Company Large Cap Vs. Russell 1000 Value Q2 2025 Commentary
summary: The London Company Large Cap portfolio declined 0.2% during the second quarter (-0.4% net) vs. a 3.8% increase in the Russell 1000 Value Index. Read more here.

headline: BofA Sees Beaten Down Insurance Stocks Primed for Rebound
